knit 2 stitches together ssk slip slip and knit together 3 x 3 ribbing knit 3 stitches/purl 3 stitches rm remove marker pm place marker pattern notes this hat is very stretchy and the smaller size will stretch to fit up to 22 head the fit for the smaller size on larger heads is snug so you may want to knit larger size for 22 head and larger hat has a 2 5-inch folded brim there are two hat length options for a fitted beanie or a slightly longer pointed hat the chart below suggests approximate knitting length for body of hat before decreasing for both styles and sizes finished lengths w/2 5-inch folded brim beanie is 8 and pointed hat is 10 you can adjust overall length by adding or removing rounds at the end of the page 2 is a four-sided decrease version of this hat just in case you are wanting a slightly different shaping to the top of the hat try them both and see which one you like the best ©2023 galzanne knits all rights reserved for private use only 2 sizes fitted beanie pointed hat small -108 stitches 104 stitches 8 8 5 inches from cast on 9 -
